title: Another Instance of League of Legends is already running would you like to close it?
body:
Hey guys, 

I have a problem with my LoL launcher, it says that " another instance of league of legends is running" i have tried several things to fix this problem but nothing works. 
I've went to task manager and stopped the programs of league and reopened them but it won't work. 
I've uninstalled the patcher & launcher than downloaded again, not working again. 
I had this problem after my computer not shutting down properly.



Can someone please help me with this problem!! 
Much appreciated guys.

replies.body:
Hey Hi im Nimmy,

Can you try running the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file in your League of Legends folder and see if the client opens up after that?
Kind of late, but this worked for me
do you mean launching it after i end task manager on League?
If you run it as an administrator, it should be able to close previous applications of League of Legends.

Hmm
i reinstalled it, & did what was instructed. 
I opened it from lol.launcher.admin.exe and ran the launcher as admin.
still i can not see the league of legends even open. 
It says in task manager it is patching by itself, but says error after it is done.

It's possible this may be due to a connection issue to the Riot Games servers. I would recommend either adding League of Legends as an exception to any antivirus applications and firewalls you may have or disabling them altogether and see if the launcher loads properly after that.

i tried it didn't work ;.; 
no league for ages man ...
Can you go into your patcher logs folder and upload a log to http://upload.wrenchmen.org/ ?
Hey wuks, have you seen the file i have uploaded?
do not open the league of legends and tells me is already running what must be to do?
Click cancel and you just got to wait. It will load
